locations.name: Cape Town
locations.description: The starting point of the tour, a vibrant coastal city known for Table Mountain, diverse culture, and the V&A Waterfront.

locations.name: Stellenbosch (Cape Winelands)
locations.description: A key town within the Cape Winelands region, famous for its historic vineyards, wine tasting, and charming atmosphere. Chosen as a representative overnight base for exploring the Winelands.

locations.name: Madikwe Game Reserve
locations.description: A malaria-free Big Five game reserve in South Africa's North West province, offering exclusive safari experiences and overnight stays in lodges within or bordering the reserve.

locations.name: Benguerra Island (Bazaruto Archipelago)
locations.description: A tropical island paradise in Mozambique's Bazaruto Archipelago, offering luxury accommodation for relaxation, diving, snorkeling, and beach activities.
